籤詩版本二:
Amaqabunga emisikamori asewile, ikwindla isondela, futhi uhambo lokubuya lwabahambi lubukeka njengamafu.
Ngenxa yemizamo kaNkulunkulu emikhulu, umkhumbi wabuya nomcebo emoyeni.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele isithombe samaqabunga esikamore awile.
Konke kubi kusenesikhathi futhi kuhle ekugcineni.
解曰: Thatha izinto enhliziyweni. U-Tianxin uyalilandela. Ukuziphilisa. Yenza noma yini ongayenza.
